menu.title: 'Fitness' Menu
menu.descr: Menu 'Fitness' - is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. Product of active and healthy people. It is a brand new product with optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: 'Lean' Menu
menu.descr: The 'Lean' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein due to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: 'Premium' Menu
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also quality dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruit - restaurant menu without going to restaurant!
